topic.title: It's possiable to add a vote hide or delete function?
topic.body: Many visitors didn't read the rules or just post Ads everywhere which is annoying. Especially I felt shame to watch those people ignore other peoples' feeling and post Chinese stuff on the main section. Just wondering it's possible to add an admin or a vote hide (move or delete) the posts or replies function?

topic.title: How to mute or block someone?
topic.body: Just want to block some people because their unfriendly replies, but I didn't see any button which I can click. Any idea?

1_1LESBhM9ResjKhCCNhgbNDVFKcfdQractA.body:
> [woniu](#comment_1_1N42mMrwtxF2WK8W6LrvcvbS9KwuQFTJk4): 我是中国人，我用中文发帖，这有什么问题？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？？

中国人去中文板块也没什么问题啊 =,=???

> [acthor](#comment_5_1Fua8zS8Lesf6gvsT5fDKNB2U3sF9rt4F): 我还以为粉红是不会跑来zeronetnet来的，但某些人莫名其妙的民族自豪感和自私自利真是让人大跌眼镜。中华美德，不说美德，礼节礼貌都被你们弃置不管，还好意思一口一个我用中文我自豪。当着天朝下等公民还吧自己当贵族。 [...]

这叫礼貌，不叫低声下气。很欢迎你用英文在这个版块下随意聊天，没这个能力就移步中文区并没有什么问题

> [beatles](#comment_2_1Pjg7tm8HFFw9vgR7x4NAfktrY4PV33At2): 这么跪舔？要不你开个英语补习班吧，顺便帮大家补习下英语

人家没在跪舔，而是你自己是学渣不能怪别人是正常人 :)

> [woniu](#comment_2_1N42mMrwtxF2WK8W6LrvcvbS9KwuQFTJk4): 你是中国人吗，你在这干嘛！？

因为我会英语，我能用中英两种语言礼貌地阅读和回复 :)

1_1Np58q7bCfW7hmHuXvoYux3ij6M4Qecfb3.body:
This is a new website or new concept for many of us. They are excited and rushing into this hub without reading the rules or introduction. I personally apologize for their rudeness especially posting not English reply or posts.
For recommendation, please Chinese speakers reply in English in this section or move to Chinese section.
Http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit/?Main
PS. I have contributed about 600MB disk space, I hope I am not asking too much for posting my blog link here :)
Http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CNvGEzT1Mn8UFSJVR7Pm6CaL7thPcDXj6/

This post will be deleted about a week (if I did not forget). If I did forget, you are welcome to remind me via message at my website.

---Selected and Translated from the origianal post.
---已经从原文节选翻译

1_19i26STfYVZkMToLLgCunQ1dDZDrHaRdxt.body: 问题解决了就删了嗷或者移步中文论坛 好人+1s

4_15Q5U52Aqgjb66GkzhkGKDYgWsqR8TEkJG.body: Good idea and wish more people can realize it is time for a administrator intervene?

> [donehrenmann2](#comment_1_1BpNbHgqwXTmdgJar9TbkFpNrD43ztsKWy): Maybe the solution is them understanding they have their own forum ?

Believe me, we have tried, tried so hard to "make them understand". But many of them just click in and post, ignored those notices. Especially those people who hava little education will not change their mind so easily. I personally hope we can vote to hide or delete posts or replies.

1_1k8EGYLYfhutuFjGEoC7nhQ9cbu4eT35G.body:
> [woniu](#comment_4_1N42mMrwtxF2WK8W6LrvcvbS9KwuQFTJk4): what are you talkinig about ??

some bullshit about chinese gov.

1_1B6gdw9RZ4h389fY8ezsWPUVsLfrTcpfQb.body: 中文贴请发中文论坛谢谢 <(￣︶￣)>
